TopicTitle: SampleQuest: a new KSP Twitch series

Articles.Content:
Starting a new stream series today. Will be playing Vanilla KSP (no mods) in career mode and attempt to bring back a sample from each planet/moon you can land on through a series of missions. Quicksaves will only be used to recover from time warp related mishaps, so failure is an option. I will do my best to keep my Kerbals alive, and will attempt to rescue any stranded Kerbalnauts.

Come join me on my SampleQuest!

http://twitch.tv/buckeyemonkey
